Title: Colourful
Actors: Kumiko Asô, Chris Ayres, Greg Ayres, Clint Bickham
Plot: A sinful spirit is granted the opportunity to prove worthy for rebirth, inhabiting the body of a student who killed himself.
Production: Eurozoom, Sunrise Inc., Dentsu, Aniplex, Sony Music Entertainment (Japan) Inc., Toho Company Ltd., Anime Network
